title: Episode #42: Mindsets for Success Part 4: The Time, Possible, and Gratitude Mindsets
description:
See failures as opportunities to gain more knowledge.
A mindset is an attitude, or a cluster of thoughts with attached information and emotions that generate a particular perception. They shape how you see and interact with the world. They can catapult you forward, allowing you to achieve dreams, or put you in reverse drive if you are not careful.
In this episode I discuss the Time, Possible, and Gratitude Mindsets.
For more info, get my book THINK LEARN SUCCEED: https://thinklearnsucceedbook.com
dc:creator: Dr. Caroline Leaf
